text:
@RudyGiuliani You're under investigation; or did Barr come to the rescue. It won't matter because once Trump's out a new AG will bring charges. 

.@realDonaldTrump's pathetic, weak, incompetent response to COVID-19 cost and continues to cost tens of thousands of American lives.
